transcript:
and ran into the bedroom. The eldest princess and Prince Vasfli, recover- ing themselves, followed her, A few minutes lat- er the eldest sister came out with a pale hard face, again biting her underlip. At sight of Pierre her expression showed an irrepressible hatred. 
"Yes, now you may be glad!" said she; "this is what you have been waiting for." And burst- ing into tears she hid her face in her handker- chief and rushed from the room.
